textos_fuente.text: About Us ‚Äì Tulum Skip to content Home About Us Food Menu Lunch Menu Bar Menu Contact Us Home About Us Food Menu Lunch Menu Bar Menu Contact Us Order Now: +1 336.448.5486 Menu About Home About Modern Mexican restaurant in Winston Salem Tulum Bar & Grill is a center of countless authentic gastronomic experiences, a place full of flavors, aromas, elegance, tradition, and unique spaces designed for all occasions. We are a concept inspired by the beauty, the beaches, and the atmosphere of the wonderful beaches of Tulum in Mexico, where magical and unique stories take place, which can only happen in places as special as this one. Tulum Bar & Grill New experience in mexican cuisine Food For You Let yourself be carried away by the unique flavors of our menu, created by Mexicans and carefully thought out on the palate and the typical flavors of true Mexican cuisine. Quality Ingredients Taste Driven Best Receipts Special Cuisine El lugar de los sabores que hacen viajar a M√©xico Real Taste Of Mexico Restaurant 411 N Cherry St Winston-Salem, NC 27101 +1 336.448.5486 Authentic Mexican Cuisine The taste of food and the beauty of Tulum beach in one place Restaurant 411 N Cherry St Winston-Salem, NC 27101 +1 336.448.5486 Authentic Mexican Cuisine The taste of food and the beauty of Tulum beach in one place Jki-facebook-light Envelope Phone-alt Jki-instagram-1-light Yelp TULUM Bar & Grill Copyright ¬© 2024 ¬∑ All Rights Reserved By Decals Performance EN ES EN

Our tequila lounge and restaurant blend opulence with authentic flavors, offering a sensory journey through the rich tapestry of Latin American cuisine. Immerse yourself in an ambience that captures the essence of Latin America‚Äôs vibrant culture, while savoring meticulously crafted dishes and extensive selection of premium tequilas. With our reserve collection of over 100 tequilas and mezcals, we can make over 5,700,000 possible margarita combinations. Welcome to a haven, where every detail reflects our commitment to delivering a luxurious, fun, and unforgettable dining experience. Best Restaurants in Tulum Mexico Toggle navigation Book √ó Rooms Dining Restaurant Romantic Dinners Specials Packages Experiences Fun Times Romantic Experiences Special Ocasions Explore Tulum Sustainability Sustainability Turtle Season Info Jaguar Park Guidelines FAQs Fact Sheet Blog Careers Mi Amor Colibri Boutique Hotels La Zebra Mezzanine Yemaya Lula Contact Us Resevation & Cancellation Policy Privacy Policy Book DINING ‚ÄúBold, contemporary flavors that capture the essence of a love affair with the timeless classics from Mexico‚Äôs coastal regions.‚Äù Highlighting Mexico‚Äôs abundance of seafood, featuring brunch eveary day and an intimate dinner menu for the evening to enjoy on the stunning Mi Amor foreshore, the perfect setting to gather, to share, and to laugh. A menu to excite the senses and surrender to your cravings. A playful salute to some of Mexico‚Äôs timeless classics, we creatively introduce a contemporary kitchen approach to surprise and delight with each bite. FLAVORS TO FALL IN LOVE WITH E xperiment and explore flavors together, find the taste that best suits your palates inside our cocktail list.¬† Or just have fun having your favorite drink, or two.¬† Try our exceptional Cocktail menu and fine selection of wines. If you want to learn to shake the classics with your feet fresh and playful inside the pool, ask about our Cocktail Class. * Please note that in order to preserve the romantic atmosphere, both our rooms and restaurant are for adults only. IMPORTANT: ACCESS TO A NATURAL AREA Mi Amor Hotel is nestled within a stunning natural area of Tulum, which requires an entry fee dedicated to the preservation of flora and fauna. Authorities have introduced new regulations. Combustion vehicles are not allowed; only electric vehicles such as cars, motorcycles, or scooters may enter. Mi Amor does not have parking, so we highly recommend arriving by transportation service or taxi. Within the area, transportation options are available to facilitate your mobility. The general access hours are from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm. A restaurant reservation is essential at all times to enter the natural area. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. √ó TAKE A PEEK INSIDE OUR MENUS BREAKFAST BRUNCH DINNER DRINKS DESSERTS WINE ROMANTIC DINNER DRESS CODE Casual SERVICE HOURS Breakfast 7:30 am ‚Äì 11:45 am Brunch 12:00 pm ‚Äì 6:00 pm Dinner 6:00 ‚Äì 10:00 pm Bar: 7:30 am ‚Äì 10:30 pm SMOKING AREA In accordance with Mexican law, smoking is not permitted inside the park, including our restaurant or anywhere in the hotel. DISTINTIVO H Awarded by the Ministry of Tourism & Ministry of Health to restaurants that achieve excellence in food hygiene practices. SPECIALS BRUNCH EVERY DAY Brunch every day at Mi Amor. Discover a unique menu that goes beyond Insta-worthy dishes‚Äîa concept designed to create a bonding ritual and a meaningful social experience, reviving the art of sharing and gathering. DAY : EVERY DAY HOURS: 12:00 pm to 6:00 pm VIEW MENU 2X1 TU AMOR COCKTAILS Enjoy 2-for-1 on any of our sumptuous cocktails, every day from 5 to 7 PM.
Don‚Äôt forget‚Äîour Tu Amor and Highball cocktails come with a box of bitters and spices, so you can create the perfect chemistry! DAY : EVERY DAY HOURS 5:00pm¬† to 7:00 pm VIEW COCKTAIL MENU BUBBLY MORNINGS & MIMOSA MOMENTS Start your weekend right at Mi Amor, where ocean views and laid-back vibes set the scene. Brighten your morning with the sparkle of a Mimosa‚Äîfresh, fruity, and oh-so-refreshing.

Because life‚Äôs better with bubbles. Join us for 2-for-1 Mimosas every Saturday and Sunday, and let the bubbles flow as you soak in the beauty of Tulum. DAY : SATURDAY & SUNDAY HOURS 9:00Am¬† to 3:00 pm BOOK A TABLE SUNSET SIPS & DOUBLE DELIGHTS Imagine the elegance of Mi Amor‚Äîbreathtaking ocean views and the soft rhythm of Tulum‚Äôs breeze. Now, add the perfect finishing touch: a bright, bubbly Aperol Spritz‚Äîan ideal blend of zest and sophistication.
Join us and embrace golden hour with our 2-for-1 offer. Let the romance of Mi Amor elevate your sunset experience. DAY : EVERY DAY HOURS 5:00pm¬† to 7:00 pm BOOK A TABLE OTHER COLIBRI RESTAURANTS MEZZANINE HOTEL Tulum,Mexico LA ZEBRA HOTEL Tulum, Mexico LULA HOTEL Tulum, Mexico CONNECT WITH US RESERVATIONS (+52) 984-115-4728 USA (+1) 303-952-0595 Location Service Operated by Operadora Gran Hotel, SA de CV. Palmilla Cocina y Tequila | Sonoran-Baja Cuisine in the OC PALMILLA HERMOSA BEACH 39 Pier Ave, Hermosa Beach, CA 90254 310-374-4440 FOLLOW US PALMILLA NEWPORT BEACH 3110 Newport Blvd, Palmilla Newport, CA 90254 949-220-1290 FOLLOW US Home Locations Hermosa Beach Newport Beach About Us Menus Food Menu Brunch Drinks Gallery Gift Cards Contact ¬© Copyright 2025 Palmilla Cocina Y Tequila. All Right Reserved. Home Locations Hermosa Beach Newport Beach About Us Menus Food Menu Brunch Drinks Gallery Gift Cards Contact Welcome to Palmilla Cocina y Tequila Designed by award winning architect and designer, Gulla J√≥nsd√≥ttir, Palmilla Newport Beach is a new, elevated Sonoran- and Baja-inspired culinary and social gathering hotspot on the Newport Beach Peninsula. Under the culinary direction of SoCal's Chef Ray Alvarez, Palmilla offers vibrant Mexican dishes made with premium ingredients, a dynamic bar program featuring the largest selection of tequilas and mezcals in Orange County, and a lively atmosphere that transports locals and visitors to the coasts of Cabo San Lucas. Palmilla Cocina Y Tequila features home-style Mexican cuisine featuring the freshest seafood and the finest cuts of beef, along with an amazing selection of premium tequilas, mezcals and globally inspired wines. Both Palmilla Hermosa Beach and Palmilla Newport Beach feature lovely outdoor patio areas, perfect for soaking up the sea breezes from the Pacific ocean just footsteps away. Palmilla‚Äôs sophisticated, yet inviting dining rooms showcase imported, custom-made furniture and decor that transports guests to Mexico‚Äôs luxurious coastal landscapes. When dining at Palmilla, you will feel as if you‚Äôve been transported to an upscale boutique hotel in beautiful Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, which is where much of the inspiration of the design came from. Food Drinks Food Drinks Palmilla's Special Our Favoritos Pescado de la Dia pan seared fresh fish, choice of preparation - ranchera, veracruzana, pacifco or blackened, arroz de tomatillo, choice of side Taqueria Tacos Camarones Frito griddled queso, fresno aioli, avocado, cotija Sonoran Sunset premium mai tai made with wray & nephew jamaican white rum, bacardi reserve ocha, grand marnier cuvee louis alexander, golden falernum, myers‚Äôs dark rum float Guest Favorites PRIME FILETE MIGNON 8oz USDA certified prime center cut, chipotle crema, mushrooms, caramelized onion, enchilada de marsicos suiza Pepina Diablo cazadores blanco, organic agave nectar, fresh squeezed lime, muddled jalapeno and cucumber Photo Gallery View More in Gallery Palmilla Newport Beach 3110 Newport Blvd. Newport Beach CA 92663 House Line: 1-949-220-1290 Hours of Operation : Monday-Friday: 11am - 2am Saturday-Sunday 10am - 2am Reservations: Call 949-467-4203 or email nbreservations@palmillarestaurant.com Palmilla Hermosa Beach 39 Pier Ave. Hermosa Beach CA 90254 House Line: 1-310-374-4440 Hours of Operation : Mon ‚Äì Wed: 11am ‚Äì 11pm Thursday: 11am ‚Äì 12am Friday: 11am ‚Äì 1am Saturday: 10am ‚Äì 1am Sunday: 10am ‚Äì 11pm Reservations: Reservations@PalmillaHB.com ¬© Copyright 2025 Palmilla Cocina Y Tequila. Ka'teen Menus Private Events Reservations Reservations Menus Private Events Contact Explore the Flavors of the Yucatan Peninsula KA√¢¬Ä¬ôTEEN is a fresh take on the ancient cuisine of the Yucatan Peninsula, brought to you by Chef Wes Avila. Chef Story Chef Wes Avila An icon of the Los Angeles food scene, Chef Wes Avila began his career with stints at L'Auberge, March√É¬© and Le Comptoir.√Ç¬†√Ç¬†He is best known for the meteoric rise of Guerilla Tacos, which he started as an experimental street cart. The cart eventually became a roving food truck, and subsequently, an award-winning brick and mortar restaurant in Los Angeles√¢¬Ä¬ô Arts District. In fall 2020, Avila opened Angry Egret Dinette, a genre-bending ode to Los Angeles√¢¬Ä¬ô street food culture located in Chinatown√¢¬Ä¬ôs Mandarin Plaza. Long revered for his distinct culinary perspective, Avila has received recognition from the Michelin Guide and the James Beard Foundation for his nuanced blend of regional California and Mexican cuisine. The Story KA√¢¬Ä¬ôTEEN is an adventure to the lush jungles of the Yucatan Peninsula, nestled in the bustling heart of Hollywood. Created by Chef Wes Avila and Ten Five Hospitality, celebrated Los Angeles chef and founder of legendary taqueria Guerilla Tacos, the restaurant and Mezcal bar serves up discovery within every dish. The name Ka√¢¬Ä¬ôteen means √¢¬Ä¬úafresh√¢¬Ä¬ù in Mayan, perfectly describing chef Avila√¢¬Ä¬ôs vibrant interpretation of the region√¢¬Ä¬ôs rich and diverse culinary traditions. Immersed in 5,000 square feet of Aztec-inspired tropical garden space, guests can expand their palettes and broaden their horizons through creative tequila cocktails, bold Latin-American flavors and DJ sets that recall the rhythm of the rainforests. Ancient culinary traditions, reinvented An artful take on ancient Yucatan culinary tradition, made with the freshest ingredients hand-picked from local purveyors and farmers. Stepping into Tulum Prime Tequila Lounge & Restaurant felt like stepping into a cherished memory. From the moment I walked through the door, I was enveloped in an atmosphere that whispered promises of an unforgettable evening.

The warmth of the dimly lit space, the subtle aroma of spices dancing in the air, and the soft murmur of laughter from fellow diners created an ambiance that instantly put me at ease. As I settled into my seat, I couldn't help but feel a sense of anticipation building within me ‚Äì a feeling that this would be more than just a meal, but a culinary journey to remember.

The menu, a testament to the creativity and passion of the chefs, offered a tantalizing array of dishes that promised to delight the senses. Each bite was a revelation, a symphony of flavors that danced across my palate and left me craving more. From the zesty ceviche to the melt-in-your-mouth carne asada, every dish was a masterpiece in its own right.

And then there was the tequila ‚Äì oh, the tequila. As someone who considers themselves a bit of a connoisseur, I was blown away by the selection at Tulum Prime. From aged reposados to smoky mezcals, there was something for every palate. The bartender, a true aficionado, guided me through the options with a passion and knowledge that was infectious, ensuring that each sip was savored and appreciated.

But perhaps what left the greatest impression on me was the service. It wasn't just attentive ‚Äì it was personal. From the moment I walked in, I felt like more than just a customer; I felt like a welcomed guest in someone's home. The staff, with their genuine smiles and genuine interest in ensuring my experience was nothing short of perfect, made me feel like I belonged.

In the end, my evening at Tulum Prime Tequila Lounge & Restaurant was more than just a meal ‚Äì it was an experience that touched my heart and soul. It's rare to find a place that combines exceptional food, an inviting atmosphere, and genuine hospitality in such perfect harmony, but Tulum Prime does just that. It's a place I won't soon forget, and one I'll be returning to again and again. The waiters and waitresses were committed to great service and very friendly. There‚Äôs a live Dj with great music where every bite of the food makes you want to get up

From the appetizers to the entrees the food was delicious ü§§, well serve  and the presentation makes you want to flick a pic for the gram.

I Highly recommend this place to anyone and everyone who wants to get out the house and catch a great vibe with friends and family, even if you come alone you‚Äôll definitely meet some cool people here .. Very prompt and fast with service. Food came out in a good time frame as well. I loved the beef nachos. For an entree we got the bowl that had different proteins called ‚Äútulum Molacajete‚Äù - the steak and fried cheese was to die for !! They give you a side of tortillas to make your own taco from.
